basic_information.scholarship_name: David Webb Scholarship for History and Geography

description: Established in honor of Dr. David Webb, who taught for 47 years, this scholarship provides funds to an undergraduate or graduate student who has financial need and shows academic promise. Eligibility Requirements History or Geography major Full-time student at the time of disbursement Demonstrates financial need and promise of academic success through a 1-2 page essay Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
